actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to celebrate the 250th anniversary of the arrival of the first Acadians in the American colonies.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that a commemorative postage stamp be issued in 2005 to celebrate the 250th anniversary of the arrival of the first Acadians in the American colonies in 1755.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to celebrate the 250th anniversary of the arrival of the first Acadians in the American colonies.
